name: testautomation_hu
description: GraphQL - npm install: @apollo/server, express     In memory Rest mock install: express-openapi-validator, ymljs, express     Kafka: npm i kafkajs, express.       install docker a host gepre, futtatni, majd 'docker compose up' a mappaban ahol a docker-compose megtalalhato. Ha fut a service dockerben, akkor inditani a kafka-mock.js-t (node kafka-mock.js parancs)
